SEARCH
Package users

Class BaseUser

java.lang.Object
users.BaseUser
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Employee, Student
public abstract class BaseUser extends Object implements User, Serializable
Represents a base user in the system. Provides foundational attributes and methods for derived user types. This class is abstract and cannot be instantiated directly.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • BaseUser

      public BaseUser()
      Default constructor. Generates a unique user ID from the database.

    • BaseUser

      public BaseUser(String firstName, String lastName, int age, Gender gender)
      Parameterized constructor to initialize a user with basic personal information.
      Parameters:
      firstName - First name of the user
      lastName - Last name of the user
      age - Age of the user
      gender - Gender of the user
